pages.title: Window Types
pages.text: These 3D framed windows have slightly stained panes, and can be placed horizontally or vertically.$(br)Other than vanilla glass panes, windows have no corner pieces, and the window glass will remain intact when you break the block (no $(o)Silk Touch$() needed).

pages.title: Placement
pages.text: To place a window in the ceiling or the floor, you have to look almost straight up or down. This makes it easier to place windows in walls without the need of scaffolding (or accidentally placing them horizontally). When you place a window next to another one, the same orientation will be used for similar reasons.
